targets.queryText:
SELECT
  timestamp / 1000000 as time,
  extra_data->>"$.decoder.bytes" as bytes
FROM "other-event"
WHERE
  event_type = "stats"
  AND time >= 1763208193090 / 1000 and time < 1763211608903 / 1000
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT
  timestamp / 1000000 as time,
  extra_data->>"$.decoder.bytes" as bytes
FROM "other-event"
WHERE
  event_type = "stats"
  AND time >= $__from / 1000 and time < $__to / 1000
